title: Post in this thread and I'll tell you why I admire you.
body:
Whether it's your personality, posting style, or in the case of people I don't know as well, your FEK avatar... I'll list one of the best qualities that I know about you.

Keep in mind that I have a selectively terrible memory. Unless I've seen your posts consistently enough, expect to get complimented on your avatar. =P

I'll answer a few tonight, and since I'm busy all day tomorrow, it might take me a while to get to the rest. Post away!
